properties.name: minerva.auth.header-key
properties.description: Header used to pass the authentication token to the service.

properties.name: minerva.gnupg.armored-private-key
properties.description: The GPG Private Key to use for decryption.

properties.name: minerva.gnupg.armored-public-key
properties.description: The GPG Public Key to use for encryption.

properties.name: minerva.gnupg.private-key-passphrase
properties.description: The passphrase to use for GPG Private Key.

properties.name: minerva.key-value.persistence-type
properties.description: The persistence type for the key-value store. Valid values are 'file'.

properties.name: minerva.key-value.file.path
properties.description: The path to the file to use for the key-value store.
